<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 4"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Aura of Courage](/Feats.aspx?ID=5894) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Champion" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=811" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core 2](/Sources.aspx?ID=227) pg. 94 <sup>1.1</sup>

**Prerequisites**
champion’s aura, holy

</column>

---

You stand strong in the face of danger and inspire your allies to do the same. Whenever you become [frightened](/Conditions.aspx?ID=76), reduce the condition value by 1 (to a minimum of 0). At the end of your turn, each ally in your champion's aura reduces its frightened value by 1.
name: Aura of Courage
